attributes.action: stop the payments of Child Tax Credits to people from other countries who decide to work here but their children remain in the country of origin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a migrant is given a work permit , they should not be allowed to claim for children that are left in the "home country" . At the moment migrants are allowed to claim child benefit and working tax credits for families left at "home". It has been found that (not just with )but  Eastern Europeans especially , a certain percentage have claimed both here in Britain AND in their own country . £2bn a year is lost to benefit fraud , this would be a good starting point for bringing that total down.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition, see http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/benefitscam/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
